text: Pus jo log eman laye hain aur shaista aemaal kiye hain unn ko unn ka poora poora sawab inayat farmaye ga aur apney fazal say unhen aur ziyada dey ga aur jin logon ney nang-o-aar aur sikashi aur inkar kiya unhen alam naak azab dey ga aur woh apney liye siwaye Allah kay koi himayati aur imdad kerney wala na payen gay
